name: MONEYLIFE FOUNDATION

address: off Veer Savarkar Marg, Shivaji Park

briefDescription: Moneylife Foundation is a Mumbai based non-profit organisation registered with the Charity Commissioner of Mumbai. Our activities include:1. Financial literacy workshops2. Running helplines for legal, borrowing and tax problems3. Public interest programmes4. Advocacy for financial consumersSucheta Dalal, who was awarded a Padma Shri in 2006 and Debashis Basu, (both award-winning journalists with three decades of experience), set up the Foundation in February 2010.  So far, the Foundation has over 36,000 members and has conducted over 250 workshops and seminars. Our website is http://foundation.moneylife.in/
